content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No permanent structures have been successfully established on the map. Multiple attempts were made to create and place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), but none succeeded because a Lab item was never available in the inventory. Although existing furnaces (an iron furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)) were retrieved for smelting operations, they are part of the pre‐existing environment and were not newly created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
• Incorrect get_entities usage
 – When calling get_entities, remove unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. do not use “radius”) and ensure the number and type of arguments match the function’s specification.
• Inadequate handling of empty entity lists
 – Before iterating over the result from get_entities, check for None and default to an empty list to avoid “NoneType” iteration errors.
• Lab placement without inventory verification
 – Confirm that a Lab item is present in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map.
• Lab crafting failures due to missing sub-ingredients
 – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels and electronic circuits) are available or can be produced. Verify that resource flows (e.g. from smelting iron or copper plates) are sufficient to satisfy crafting prerequisites before reattempting Lab production.
